name: Nod Zombies
description: Nowadays panhandling is big business. It seems like there’s a panhandler on every corner… Now, you can be one too, without The embarrassment of actually doing it.If you can navigate your way through the traffic without getting hit, put up with the verbal insults slung at you and can keep up with the adrenaline shots you should do well in this new and upcoming line of work!
